Deprecated Interfaces
org.im4java.process.ProcessListener
          This interface has been superseeded by ProcessEventListener 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.im4java.process.ProcessStarter.addProcessListener(ProcessListener)
          use ProcessStarter.addProcessEventListener(org.im4java.process.ProcessEventListener) instead
